text: Virgin Soil Upturned () is a 1959 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksandr Ivanov.ПОДНЯТАЯ ЦЕЛИНА (1959-1961)Актриса Людмила Хитяева отмечает юбилей It stars Pyotr Chernov, Yevgeny Matveyev, and Fyodor Shmakov. == Actors == * Pyotr Chernov as Semyon Davydov * Yevgeny Matveyev as Makar Nagulnov * Fyodor Shmakov as Andrey Razmyotnov * Vladimir Dorofeyev as Grandpa Shchukar * Lyudmila Khityaeva as Lushka * Pyotr Glebov as Aleksandr Polovtsev * Viktor Chekmaryov as Yakov Ostrovnov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1959 movies Category:Soviet drama movies
title: Virgin Soil Upturned (1959 movie)
